content:
Did something fun happen again?
I was just about to step on the gas to go investigate,
but Glenn told me to get out of the car.

It's shifted southeast from the Camp coordinates I provided,
right in the middle of the clouds and mist.
This might be related to the turbulent air currents in the southeast.
<size=30>Good thing I called out in time...</size>

Sorry, I'm still exploring my surroundings.
Going out to explore might be a bit...

What a coincidence!
I'll bring them back while I investigate.
I'm heading out now!

Hoho, our world bubble is experiencing "returning mist,"
The surrounding waters are covered in clouds and fog,
Probably due to the turbulent flows - I'm sure you're all aware of this by now.
I called everyone here because Mors has arrived.

I'll stay at the Camp in case Mors comes back on his own.
As for Glenn... hoho! He probably can't leave his post.
It seems...

Ah, my apologies,
Please wait a moment, hoho hoho...
Let me think about this carefully.

Great! Welcome...
Huh? Where did everyone go?

Hoho, we lost contact~!
Based on my rudimentary knowledge of Astralink coordinates,
I calculated where Mors might have landed...
Thank you all for taking the time to gather at the Camp.

Going out to investigate - considering all possibilities,
we can't just send a driver alone.
Could we assign someone else to accompany Sani?

Now, let's begin our very first
<size=64>Neighborhood Assembly</size>!

Alright then—
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
let's go out and play— I mean, pick up Mors!
